title.value: Video Game Bad Smells: What They Are and How Developers Perceive Them
title.justification: The title is clearly mentioned at the beginning of the document, along with authors' names and affiliations.
title.quote: Video Game Bad Smells: What They Are and How Developers Perceive Them

extractions.description: This paper defines a catalog of 28 bad smells in video game development, organized into five categories related to game design, logic, physics, animation, rendering, or multiplayer. It involves mining discussions from forums and assessing the relevance of these smells through a survey with 76 game development professionals.

type.justification: The paper conducts an empirical study by analyzing forum posts and conducting a survey with game development professionals.
type.quote: To bridge such a gap, this article empirically analyzes the bad video game development practices that are discussed by developers on forums...
